help-file.title: "VENTRILOQUATE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> | <object> Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic Syntax: cast 'ventriloquate' <victim | object> <text>
All those in the room falling to the caster's enchantment will believe that the victim or object has spoken the desired text.
